---
title: Dorsal Pedal Artery
---


# Pulse Palpation

"The pulse of the posterior (dorsal) pedis artery, a branch of the anterior tibial artery, can be palpated over the talus, cuneiform bones (Fig. 21-14), between the first and second cuneiforms or between the first and second metatarsal bones." @duttonDuttonOrthopaedicExamination2020
